schemes.name: Unique Disability ID (UDID)
schemes.description: A unique identification document for persons with disabilities providing single document for accessing various services and benefits.
schemes.eligibility: Persons with disabilities having 40% or more disability
schemes.application_process: Apply online at www.swavlambancard.gov.in or at nearest Common Service Center

schemes.name: Assistance to Disabled Persons (ADIP)
schemes.description: Scheme to assist needy disabled persons in procuring durable, sophisticated and scientifically manufactured modern aids and appliances.
schemes.eligibility: Persons with disabilities having monthly income not exceeding Rs. 20,000
schemes.application_process: Apply through implementing agencies or district collectors

schemes.name: Deen Dayal Disabled Rehabilitation Scheme (DDRS)
schemes.description: Financial assistance to NGOs for providing rehabilitation services to persons with disabilities.
schemes.eligibility: NGOs working for persons with disabilities
schemes.application_process: Apply through online portal of Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities

schemes.name: Rajiv Gandhi Scheme for Empowerment of Adolescent Girls (SABLA)
schemes.description: Scheme for adolescent girls including those with disabilities focusing on nutrition, life skills and vocational training.
schemes.eligibility: Adolescent girls aged 11-18 years including those with disabilities
schemes.application_process: Register at nearest Anganwadi center or district women and child development office

schemes.name: Maharashtra Disability Pension Scheme
schemes.description: Monthly pension for persons with disabilities to support their basic needs and improve quality of life.
schemes.eligibility: Persons with 40% or more disability, age 18-65 years, annual income below Rs. 1 lakh
schemes.application_process: Apply at nearest Collector office or online through state portal

schemes.name: Karnataka Divyangjan Sahayata Scheme
schemes.description: Comprehensive support scheme for persons with disabilities including financial assistance and rehabilitation services.
schemes.eligibility: Persons with disabilities certified by competent authority
schemes.application_process: Apply at district disability rehabilitation centers

schemes.name: Tamil Nadu Chief Minister's Comprehensive Health Insurance Scheme
schemes.description: Free medical treatment for persons with disabilities and their families through empaneled hospitals.
schemes.eligibility: BPL families and persons with disabilities
benefits: Free treatment up to Rs. 4 lakh per year
schemes.application_process: Register at primary health centers or through online portal

schemes.name: West Bengal Disability Allowance Scheme
schemes.description: Monthly financial assistance to persons with disabilities to meet their basic needs.
schemes.eligibility: Persons with 40% or more disability, age above 18 years
schemes.application_process: Apply through block development offices or online portal
